metadata.synopsis: This dialogue will play when interacting with Nightsong after the Ketheric Showdown combat at the end of the Colony.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load SCL_Main_A- Using ReCon command "oe KethericShowdown_Defeat"  to teleport yourself to the Ketheric Showdown room and defeat Ketheric.- This dialogue will then be available on Nightsong by interacting with her.

0.speaker: Nightsong
0.context: NodeContext: Scorn in the heat of battle - her nemesis has just turned into a hideous monster
